column1:
toeboe,"2018-04-14T13:05:43.267Z","Possibly the best yet !!","

As a big fan of these figures I have been eagerly awaiting a Darth Maul to add to my collection, and I think it&rsquo
column2: s a shame that these figures are to be discontinued by Lego, especially as this is probably the best yet in my opinion.

column1: New building techniques in the arms allow for the figure to move
column2: his arms in a fluid manner whilst wielding his trademark double edged lightsaber, the look of the face is amazing capturing the likeness of the character perfectly, very pose-able figure which looks great on display.

column1: I know these figures are not everyone&rsquo
column2: s thing, but I for one am going to miss them I think there was lots more figures that could have been made, yes the human heads do not look as good as the helmeted figures etc, but it&rsquo
column3: s a good line that hopefully Lego will bring back one day, until then I highly recommend this figure to fans of the series.&nbsp
